Text: On the other hand, its adjusted operating margin declined by some 40 basis points (bps) and Fiserv's free cash flow conversion was below 100%, due to a decline in profitability at its Payments unit during the first quarter of 2019.
Cause: a decline in profitability at its Payments unit during the first quarter of 2019.
Effect: On the other hand, its adjusted operating margin declined by some 40 basis points (bps) and Fiserv's free cash flow conversion was below 100%
Sentence: <e2>On the other hand, its adjusted operating margin declined by some 40 basis points (bps) and Fiserv's free cash flow conversion was below 100%</e2>, due to <e1>a decline in profitability at its Payments unit during the first quarter of 2019.</e1>
